title: Tiger and the Raven
description: A young sorcerer finds himself responsible for the safety of a kingdom and in possession of the prince's heart.Book 1: The Discipline of the Warrior: Chapters 1-23 Status: CompleteBook 2: The Art of the Magician: Chapters 24-30 Status: WIPWord count: approx. 159,173 so far Warnings!
